SQL.LOAD: select cert_item_cvg_ded_id, cert_item_coverage_id, method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id, deductible, deductible_expression_id, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by from elp_cert_item_cvg_ded where cert_item_cvg_ded_id = :cert_item_cvg_ded_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select cert_item_cvg_ded_id, cert_item_coverage_id, method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id, deductible, deductible_expression_id, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by from elp_cert_item_cvg_ded where cert_item_coverage_id = :cert_item_coverage_id and method_of_repair_id = :method_of_repair_id
SQL.INSERT: insert into elp_cert_item_cvg_ded ( cert_item_cvg_ded_id, cert_item_coverage_id, method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id, deductible ) values ( :cert_item_cvg_ded_id :cert_item_coverage_id, :method_of_repair_id, :deductible_based_on_id, :deductible )
SQL.UPDATE: update elp_cert_item_cvg_ded set cert_item_coverage_id = :cert_item_coverage_id, method_of_repair_id = :method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id = :deductible_based_on_id, deductible = :deductible where cert_item_cvg_ded_id = :cert_item_cvg_ded_id
